website_summaries.verdict: Considered by some to be the Cadillac of knives, this quality German blade is very highly rated.
pros: This one-piece knife is manufactured in Solingen, Germany and it has a fine blade for effortless cutting
It is made from high carbon stainless steel so the blade retains its sharpness
The durable ergonomic handle is held in place with 3 rivets
cons: Other than a few minor quibbles, the priciness of this product is the only real hinderance to purchasing

customer_reviews.title: I like the cool metallic scraping sound sound the knives make ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp..... All slice thru anything. Cutting vegetables is not a chore anymore. Buy quality and it will pay off. I bought several Wusthof knives. The Classic 5.5-inch Sandwich Knife, Wusthof Gourmet 4-Piece Steak Knife Set and Wusthof 4152 Classic 9-inch Double Serrated Bread Knife bread knife, Wusthof Classic Ikon 5-Inch Serrated Utility Knife and the Wusthof Classic Nakiri Vegetable Knife with Hollow Edge along with the Wusthof 17 Slot Walnut Storage Block. I like the cool metallic scraping sound sound the knives make as I either insert or pull them out of the storage block. The grocery store utility knife I have just makes a dull thunk.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My "Go To" Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Wusthof 5 inch serrated utility knife and I love them. I use it everyday. My first one is over 8 years old and performs like it was new. When I found myself carrying it between houses for over 6 months I just went ahead and made the investment in another one and this time I stepped up to the Classic Ikon design. A lovely knife in every way,
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Foster

customer_reviews.title: Best made better
customer_reviews.text: The classic Wusthof top quality blade with an ergonomic handle is just the best! Slicing tomatoes or a baguette this knife is up to the job.
customer_reviews.author: TeaBot

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome serrated utility knife! I use it every single day. Absolute best knife for slicing tomatoes!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best quality! This item has brought the ease of preparation and the sense of joy and amazement to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene K

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son who likes the finer things in his kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and sassy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 'go to' knife in the block. It slices delicate tomatoes and over-stuffed sandwiches with equal ease. This well-balanced, sharp knife is a beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Joy G

customer_reviews.title: This quickly became my favorite utility knife
customer_reviews.text: I have several Wusthof knives I use regularly. This quickly became my favorite utility knife. The ease of use and sharpness is unmatched!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Expected
customer_reviews.text: This knife is simply stupendous. It's razor sharp, exquisitely made and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Boomer49

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this serrated utility knife by Wusthof
customer_reviews.text: This knife is the best! I own several Wusthof Ikon knifes and this is actually one of my favorites. It slices through vegetables (like tomatoes) like they are butter. Absolutely no cons to this knife; only pros. I do hand wash my knives; never put them in the dishwasher. (Not sure if these are dishwasher safe but I still hand wash them.) Anyway, highly recommend this knife!
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Girl TX

customer_reviews.title: It's indispensible in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for years, but when I dropped it into the sink disposal 3-4 years ago, it took a beating, and the handle is now coming off in pieces. Perfect replacement. A bit pricey, but worth every nickel.
customer_reviews.author: Henry E. Grimball

customer_reviews.title: couldn't do without it
customer_reviews.text: Great knife - replacing a 20 year old one that broke when I dropped it on a tile floor. It's nice to have a fresh, new, very sharp serrated knife. The size is very useful for hard sausages, as the name implies, perfect for tomatoes of all sizes and shapes, and works well on baguettes, rolls, and other smaller baked items.
customer_reviews.author: E. White

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT TOMATO SLICER.
customer_reviews.text: This makes slicing a tomato a breeze. Also, it is great for slicing a sandwich without smashing it from knife pressure. Maybe not your everyday knife, but it has it's place.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Like A Hot Knife Through Butter
customer_reviews.text: Rather than using my serrated bread knife, I now use this knife on tomatoes and other soft fruit/vegetables!
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: Cuts nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, I dropped my first one and the handle broke.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Pawlawski

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Its a thinner knife than expected .. but still sharp and ready to go .. cuts meat, vegetables or anything else like butter
customer_reviews.author: steve36

customer_reviews.title: So far it does what I would expect. A ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it does what I would expect. A bit more flex to the blade than I would have thought.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H

customer_reviews.title: Favorite knife of the set
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased the Wusthof 14 piece set which didn't contain this knife. We knew we wanted this knife, so we decided to purchase separately. We're so glad we did. This is the best knife in our set...in our humble opinion. Perfect size and excellent feel. Cutting through a tomato is like cutting through butter...LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Church

customer_reviews.title: Should Last a Lifetime
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with this knife with it's construction, looks and use. No China garbage here, pure German quality.
customer_reviews.author: PD-68

customer_reviews.title: Insanely sharp serrated cutting action
customer_reviews.text: Requested and received this as a bday present. This bad boy will cut through anything with ease. I actually had to adjust my cutting style because the knife was sticking in my wood cutting board. Extremely satisfied, love cutting thin slices of tomato, lemons, whatever. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: a critical knife in your set
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to knife when trimming small cuts of raw meat. The serrated edge makes it great for cutting soft foods, and the 5" length is perfectly suited for a variety of tasks. Great for avocados, too. Not sure why it's called a "sausage knife" but it's an incredibly useful knife if you're expanding beyond the simple chef's knife/paring knife combo.
customer_reviews.author: UnisonTop Contributor: Photography

product_meta.title: Wusthof Classic Ikon 5-Inch Serrated Utility Knife, Black
product_meta.description: Presicion forged, full tang serrated utility knife. Slender blade for smooth cutting. Serrations allow for crush free cutting through firm foods.
feature_bullets: WÜSTHOF CLASSIC IKON SERIES – Features a sleek and sophisticated black handle with a double bolster for exceptional balance, beauty, and the ultimate cutting experience. Classic IKON: Design, Ergonomics, and Quality Perfected

PRECISION FORGED – Forged from a single block of High Carbon Stainless Steel and tempered to 58-degree HRC. The Precision Edge Technology (PEtec) yields a blade that is 20% sharper with twice the edge retention than previous models

UTILITY KNIFE – The CLASSIC IKON 5"Serrated Utility Knife is smaller than a cook’s knife but larger than a paring knife, making it the perfect knife for magnitude of tasks. A utility knife is much like a versatile paring knife and is perfect for mincing shallots, onions and herbs as well as cutting vegetables or cutting small meats. The added serrated edge has saw-like teeth that enable the blade to slice cleanly through food with delicate textures such as bread or soft vegetables and fruit
DURABLE – WÜSTHOF Cutlery is crafted to resist corrosion and dulling. This German made Kitchen Knife set Comes with a limited Lifetime Warranty

CENTURIES OF TRADITION – Family owned for seven generations, WÜSTHOF was founded in Solingen, Germany over 200 years ago. WÜSTHOF’s cutlery carries the Solingen name, a designation reserved for products that meet the strictest quality standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
